SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.aligner.description: Aligner to be used. Options are: ua, ua-meth, star. Mandatory if align step is selected.

SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.star_align_extr.description: Extra arguments for the STAR aligner.

SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.star_align_gtf_.description: GTF file to be used for STAR aligner.

SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.star_genome.description: Star genome file. If aligner is star, supllay either star genome file or generate new genome index.

SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.ua_meth_paramet.description: Parameters for the UA meth aligner. Mandatory if aligner is ua-meth.

SingleCell.TrimAlignSort.ua_parameters.description: Parameters for the UA aligner. Mandatory if aligner is ua.

SingleCell.additional_rg.description: Additional read group name for a third read, e.g. S1_L001_I1_001

SingleCell.barcode_rg.description: Read group name for the barcode reads, e.g. S1_L001_R1_001

SingleCell.base_file_name.description: Base file name for output files. The output files will be named <tt>[base_file_name]*.fastq.gz</tt>

SingleCell.cpu.description: Number of CPUs to use (for Trimmer, conversion to fastq, and alignment tasks)

SingleCell.downstream_analysis.description: Can be either star_solo, star, or undefined (default)

SingleCell.genome_generate_params.description: Parameters that can be passed to the StarSolo or StarAlignment task, for formatting a STAR genome.  See input template

SingleCell.insert_rg.description: Read group name for the insert reads, e.g. S1_L001_R2_001

SingleCell.no_address.description: Should the instances used be without external IP address. Allows for more parallelization, but not supported with Dockerhub dockers Default: true

SingleCell.qc_thresholds.description: Thresholds for the single cell qc

SingleCell.ref_fastas_cram.description: Reference fasta files for the CRAM file

SingleCell.sorter_params.description: Parameters for Sorter task.  See input template

SingleCell.star_align_extra_args.description: Extra parameters to pass to the StarAlignment task.  See input template

SingleCell.star_align_gtf_override.description: The gtf to use in the StarAlignment task.  See input template

SingleCell.star_genome.description: The genome to use in the StarAlignment task.  See input template

SingleCell.star_solo_params.description: Parameters for running the StarSolo task.  See input template

SingleCell.steps.description: The steps to run in the workflow (trim+sort)

SingleCell.trimmer_parameters.description: Parameters for Trimmer task.  See input template
